attributes.action: Make Marmite Mining A Competitive Sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Marmite mining is fingering a male or females bum hole. It is a well known sport in other countries and is getting big in this country. It is a low budget only needing lube and people.

I think this would be a great addition to the 2012 olympics

thankyou

Grant Neal

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
